start:
Hi, this Telegram bot was creating for actions with matrices.
Write /m (name) to add new matrix. Name can be only one Capital Latin letter.
 If you want solve system of linear equations tap /solveSoLE comand.
invalidMatr:
Matrix is invalid.
Please enter your matrix again:
invalidSystem:
System is invalid.
Please enter your system matrix again:
help:
/m (name) - add new matrix. Name can be only one Capital Latin letter
Matrix must be entered as this:
 1 2 3/2
 3 4/9 5
 1 2 3
/print (name) - print your matrix
/determinant (name) - show determinant of your matrix
/range (name) - show range of your matrix
/transpose (name) - transpose your matrix
/invert (name) - show invertible to your matrix
/solveSoLE - solve your linear system
